text: Tansel Turgut (Born 1966) is a Turkish-American cardiologist and chess player. In 2007, he earned the title of International Correspondence Chess Grandmaster, the only grand master of correspondence chess from Turkey. He is also a FIDE Master in over the board play. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Correspondence chess grandmasters Category:Turkish chess players Category:American chess players Category:American people of Turkish descent Category:Chess FIDE Masters Category:American cardiologists Category:Asian chess biography stubs
title: Tansel Turgut
